about_the_game:
Grocery Store Simulator
Step into the fast-paced world of retail in Grocery Store Simulator!
Take on the challenge of managing every aspect of your grocery store:

  • Stock Management: Keep your shelves full by ordering, organizing, and stocking products.

  • Customer Experience: Satisfy demanding customers and keep them coming back for more.

  • Expand Your Store: Upgrade your layout, add new departments, and unlock premium products.

  • Customization: Design your store’s appearance and choose the look of your aisles, checkout counters, and displays.

  • Unique Events: Handle special challenges like sales rushes, product recalls, and unexpected shortages.

Whether you’re a beginner learning the ropes or an experienced tycoon, Grocery Store Simulator offers a fun and rewarding experience for all players.

name: Grocery Store Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3550
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Build, manage, and grow your own grocery store empire! Step into this exciting retail simulation adventure and experience the challenges and rewards of running your very own store.
